name: Link
description: The URL link shortcode lets you create links to any page on Overstock.com.

example_shortcodes.link_text: I want to buy this for my wife

required_attributes.name: url
required_attributes.description: A link to an Overstock page

optional_attributes.name: link_text
optional_attributes.description: The text that will show for the link
optional_attributes.notes: If link_text parameter is left blank, the phrase "A link to Overstock.com" will be used as the link text.

optional_attributes.name: link_target
optional_attributes.description: Choose how to open the link.
